statements: SELECT * FROM crop_health_data WHERE drone_id = 1
SELECT crop_type, health_status FROM crop_health_data WHERE health_score > 80
SELECT drone_id, health_score FROM crop_health_data WHERE capture_date = '2021-07-15'
SELECT * FROM crop_health_data ORDER BY capture_date DESC
SELECT AVG(health_score) AS average_health_score FROM crop_health_data
SELECT * FROM crop_health_data WHERE drone_id = 1
SELECT crop_type, health_status FROM crop_health_data WHERE health_status = 'Good'
SELECT drone_id, health_status, health_score FROM crop_health_data ORDER BY health_score DESC
SELECT DISTINCT crop_type FROM crop_health_data
SELECT * FROM crop_health_data WHERE capture_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM crop_health_data WHERE health_rating > 80;
SELECT crop_type, health_rating FROM crop_health_data WHERE capture_date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT * FROM crop_health_data ORDER BY health_rating DESC;
SELECT field_id, crop_type, health_rating FROM crop_health_data WHERE crop_type LIKE 'Corn%' ORDER BY capture_date ASC;
SELECT drone_id, capture_time, image_url FROM drone_capture WHERE drone_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM crop_health_data WHERE health_rating > 8 ORDER BY capture_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT crop_type, AVG(health_rating) AS avg_rating FROM crop_health_data GROUP BY crop_type HAVING avg_rating > 6;
SELECT field_id, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM crop_health_data GROUP BY field_id ORDER BY num_records DESC;
SELECT c.crop_type, d.image_url FROM crop_health_data c JOIN drone_capture d ON c.id = d.id WHERE c.health_rating < 5;
SELECT field_id, MAX(health_rating) AS max_health_rating FROM crop_health_data GROUP BY field_id HAVING max_health_rating > 7 ORDER BY max_health_rating DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM crop_health_data;
SELECT id, crop_type, health_status FROM crop_health_data WHERE health_status = 'good';
SELECT drone_id, drone_name, manufacturer FROM drone_info WHERE manufacturer = 'DJI';
SELECT * FROM drone_data ORDER BY flight_date DESC;
SELECT data_id, drone_id, crop_id, image_url FROM drone_data WHERE crop_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM drone_info
SELECT crop_type, health_status FROM crop_health_data ORDER BY capture_date DESC
SELECT image_url FROM drone_data WHERE flight_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT drone_name, manufacturer, purchase_date FROM drone_info JOIN drone_data ON drone_info.drone_id = drone_data.drone_id
SELECT crop_type, health_status, capture_date FROM crop_health_data WHERE health_status = 'healthy'
SELECT * FROM CropHealthData ORDER BY captured_date DESC;
SELECT crop_type, health_status FROM CropHealthData WHERE health_status = 'good';
SELECT * FROM DroneData WHERE captured_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT field_name, area, soil_type FROM FieldData WHERE area > 100;
SELECT trend_type, prediction_score FROM TrendAnalysis ORDER BY prediction_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM CropHealthData ORDER BY captured_date DESC, health_status ASC
SELECT crop_type, health_status FROM CropHealthData WHERE health_status='good' OR health_status='excellent' ORDER BY crop_type
SELECT location, captured_date FROM DroneData WHERE location='Farm A' AND drone_type='Type A'
SELECT field_name, area, soil_type FROM FieldData ORDER BY area DESC
SELECT trend_type, prediction_score FROM TrendAnalysis WHERE analysis_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY prediction_score DESC
SELECT * FROM CropHealthData;
SELECT drone_id, crop_type, health_status FROM CropHealthData WHERE health_status='Good';
SELECT field_name, location FROM FieldInfo WHERE crop_type='Rice';
SELECT model_name, accuracy FROM PredictiveModel ORDER BY accuracy DESC;
SELECT trend_name, confidence_level, analysis_date FROM TrendAnalysis WHERE confidence_level > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM CropHealthData WHERE health_status = 'good';
SELECT drone_id, crop_type FROM CropHealthData WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM DroneInfo ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT field_name, location FROM FieldInfo WHERE crop_type = 'corn' AND field_id < 100;
SELECT model_name, accuracy FROM PredictiveModel WHERE last_training_date > '2020-12-31' ORDER BY accuracy DESC;
